title: Decoding Galactic Chemical Evolution with Gas-phase and Stellar Abundances
venue: Yale Center for Astronomy and Astrophysics, Yale University
description: Direct method mass-metallicity relation, PCA of abundances of bulge stars, and chemical evolution modeling.

title: The Mass-Metallicity Relation in SDSS Using Electron Temperature Measurements
venue: Understanding Nebular Emission in High-Redshift Galaxies, The Carnegie Observatories
description: Direct method mass-metallicity relation and recalibration of strong line diagnostics.

title: AstroCoffee
description: Best practices for presenting at AstroCoffee.

title: Streamlining MaNGA data with Marvin
description: Data access, exploration, analysis, and visualization with the Marvin toolkit for the SDSS-IV MaNGA survey (w/ Brian Cherinka and Jose Sanchez-Gallego).

title: The SDSS-IV MaNGA Survey: Galaxy Dissection on an Industrial Scale
venue: CMU Astro Seminar, Carnegie Mellon University
description: I present the SDSS-IV MaNGA galaxy IFU survey, using the Marvin toolkit to interact with the data, and applications of machine learning methods to MaNGA data.

title: GitHub Flow
description: An introduction into a Git+GitHub workflow.

title: Hidden in Plain Sight: a Deep Learning Approach to Finding Supernovae in Galaxy Maps
description: Deep dimensionality reduction of MaNGA data cubes to find anomalous objects.

title: Effective Plotting
description: Communicate more clearly with well-designed plots.

title: The Origin of the Elements
description: Exploring the astrophysical origins of the elements across the periodic table.
